about_the_game:
Experience the life of and play 60+ different prehistoric creatures from various parts of the ecosystem.  Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies.   Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many creatures that can be hunted or hunt you.

Earn evolution points as you play by eating, killing, and completing tasks.   Use those points to customize your creature's talents and attributes and adapt to your surroundings and challenges.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

Once mature, creatures can build a nest and spawn eggs that can hatch into their very own brood.  You can also empower the eggs you'll spawn with items that you store in your nest inventory.

🔹62 playable species include:

Ankylosaurus, Archelon, Brachiosaurus, Compsognathus, Dilophosaurus, Dimetrodon, Oviraptor, Parasaurolophus, Pteranodon, Sarcosuchus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Tryannosaurus, Velociraptor, Argentinosaurus, Baryonyx, Carnotaurus, Gallimimus, Iguanodon, Kentrosaurus, Ouranosaurus, Pachycephalosaurus, Protoceratops, Styracosaurus, Troodon, Dimorphodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Ammonite, Anomalocaris, Cameroceras, Dunkleosteus, Elasmosaurus, Helicoprion, Ophthalmosaurus, Leedsichthys, Megalodon, Tylosaurus, Onchopristis, Xenacanthus, Meganeura, Titanoboa, Trilobite, Skorpiovenator, Suchomimus, Diplocaulus, Edmontosaurus, Padillasaurus, Kryptops, Giganotosaurus, Daspletosaurus, Ceratosaurus, Allosaurus, Inostrancevia, Gorgosaurus, Albertosaurus, Thalassodromeus, Dryosaurus, Acrocanthosaurus, and Therizinosaurus.

🔹Just like the creatures you play, this game is ever-growing and improving.

🔹Created by a single indie developer.

🔹Game progress is not saved while playing the demo version of the game.

Experience the life of and play 60+ different prehistoric creatures from various parts of the ecosystem.  Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies.   Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many creatures that can be hunted or hunt you.

Earn evolution points as you play by eating, killing, and completing tasks.   Use those points to customize your creature's talents and attributes and adapt to your surroundings and challenges.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

Once mature, creatures can build a nest and spawn eggs that can hatch into their very own brood.  You can also empower the eggs you'll spawn with items that you store in your nest inventory.

name: Primeval Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 11
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Can you survive an unforgiving prehistoric world? Enter the world as a hatchling, survive and grow to reach adulthood. Experience the life of and play 60+ different prehistoric species from various parts of the ecosystem. Gain talents and a hoard of items to customize your creatures and nests.
